name: Lost Cores
description:
CONTROLS:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

S - Drop through platforms

Space - Jump (+ Double Jump)

Mouse 1/Ctrl - Fire

WARNING: THIS GAME MAY BE A BIT BUGGY AS IM RELATIVELY NEW TO GAMEDEV

Lost Cores is a game based on trial and error  along with going fast. You have 90 seconds to complete 1 level. This level contains enemies and a boss at the end.

Theme: Less is More: In order to fit in with the theme, the  idea  is that  this 1 stage (less stages) can be played many times to complete (more time). Originally, I was gonna have it so the  less health  you have, the more  damage you deal, but  I wasn't  able to figure it out in time.

Pathfinding: A* Pathfinding

Font: DaggerSquare

Any constructive criticism is encouraged as I only started (properly  at least) GameDev at the beginning of this year. Please also  keep  this in  mind when you experience  anything buggy (or Buggo? [that was  a  terrible  pun I'm sorry ])

Made for the #3 Blackthornprod Game Jam
